hibernate-mapping.query: FROM NcboOntology WHERE oboFoundryId = :oboFoundryId AND internalVersionNumber = ( SELECT MAX(internalVersionNumber) FROM NcboOntology WHERE oboFoundryId = :oboFoundryId )
hibernate-mapping.sql-query: SELECT {ont.*} FROM v_ncbo_ontology {ont} INNER JOIN ( SELECT ontology_id, MAX(internal_version_number) AS internal_version_number FROM ncbo_ontology_version GROUP BY ontology_id ) a ON ont.ontology_id = a.ontology_id AND ont.internal_version_number = a.internal_version_number ORDER BY ont.display_label
